item.description:
Dear Laughing Matter Community,

Laughing Matter will host an open audition Monday August 1 st for all persons who wish to join Laughing Matter as Performance Volunteers. This audition is open to all members of the general public.

Auditioners will participate in rehearsal alongside current members, and shall be evaluated for qualities which demonstrate commitment to service, satisfy established standards for the learning and practice of improv comedy, and suggest interpersonal fit with other performance volunteers. Based on the performance of one’s audition, the Managing Director and/or Executive Director may either extend an offer of induction, suggest further outside training with an option to re-audition, or decide against induction.

Please email Harish and Jason with your name and a brief description of any previous theater, performing arts, improvisational comedy, or volunteer experience you have.

We look forward to meeting you!

The Laughing Matter Team
item.how_to_find_us: Please meet us in the lobby.

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: City-Wide Laughing Matter Audition
